name: Jingle Runner
description:
Ginger cookies, presents, Santa Claus' hat and other christmas objects are scattered over different worlds. Get as much objects as you can to be the most brave elf and that Christmas bright.

Halloween pumpkins and the Grinch are hanging around, but most of all, be careful with the giant snowball!

Features

- Simple one touch gameplay.
- 3 different worlds full of action and obstacles.
- Elf's hat with superpowers.
